projects.description: Developing a dynamic full-stack web application using SQL Server, .NET MVC, and Vue.js. Implementing CRUD operations, user authentication, role-based login, and RESTful APIs to deliver efficient data handling. This project integrates MVC and MVVM patterns to create a responsive, secure user experience.
